isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

params.to: The account for which to mint tokens.
params.value: The amount of cGLD to mint.

name().return: The name of the Celo Gold token.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

symbol().return: The symbol of the Celo Gold token.

totalSupply().return: The total amount of Celo Gold in existence.

params.to: The address to transfer Celo Gold to.
params.value: The amount of Celo Gold to transfer.

params.from: The address to transfer Celo Gold from.
params.to: The address to transfer Celo Gold to.
params.value: The amount of Celo Gold to transfer.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.to: The address to transfer Celo Gold to.
params.value: The amount of Celo Gold to transfer.

allowance(address,address).notice: Gets the amount of owner's Celo Gold allowed to be spent by spender.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approve a user to transfer Celo Gold on behalf of another user.

balanceOf(address).notice: Gets the balance of the specified address.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).notice: Decreases the allowance of another user.

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).notice: Increases the allowance of another user.

increaseSupply(uint256).notice: Increases the variable for total amount of Celo Gold in existence.

initialize(address).notice: Used in place of the constructor to allow the contract to be upgradable via proxy.

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mints new cGLD and gives it to 'to'.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfers Celo Gold from one address to another.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers Celo Gold from one address to another on behalf of a user.

transferWithComment(address,uint256,stri.notice: Transfers Celo Gold from one address to another with a comment.
